bottlenecks.name: Lack of defined KPIs
bottlenecks.diagnosis: Without clear KPIs, it's challenging to measure progress and make data-driven decisions.
tactical_fix: Define specific KPIs related to sales performance
Implement tracking mechanisms for the identified KPIs

analysis.top_recommendation: Define and track key sales performance indicators to measure progress and guide decision-making.

proposed_kpis.why: To monitor the overall sales growth performance
To assess the efficiency of sales and marketing efforts
To measure the ability to retain customers and drive recurring revenue

analysis.summary: The business lacks defined KPIs to track sales performance, hindering the ability to measure progress effectively. It is crucial to establish specific KPIs related to sales and implement tracking mechanisms to enable data-driven decision-making.

bottlenecks.name: Lack of online presence
tactical_fix: Create a professional website showcasing products

analysis.top_recommendation: Focus on building an online presence to reach more customers and drive sales

proposed_kpis.why: To measure the effectiveness of turning website visitors into customers
To track the average amount customers spend per order
To understand the cost of acquiring each new customer

analysis.summary: To increase sales for the basket making and selling business, it is crucial to establish a strong online presence through a professional website and social media marketing. Tracking website traffic, social media engagement, conversion rate, average order value, and customer acquisition cost will provide insights into the effectiveness of the sales strategy.

bottlenecks.name: Lack of online presence
bottlenecks.diagnosis: Limited reach due to absence from online platforms

analysis.top_recommendation: Establish an online store and leverage social media for marketing

proposed_kpis.why: To measure the direct impact of online initiatives on sales
To gauge the effectiveness of social media marketing
To assess the efficiency of sales and marketing efforts

analysis.summary: To increase sales for the basket making and selling business, it is crucial to establish an online presence through an e-commerce website and utilize social media for marketing. Tracking website traffic, conversion rate, online sales revenue, social media engagement, and customer acquisition cost will provide insights into the effectiveness of these initiatives.
